version_name: 9.4 now keeps your Shazams safe and in sync between all your devices. Just log in and we’ll back them up to your account

version_description:
Pssst…check out Shazam’s fresh new look and feel, and let us know how you like it!

The best of Shazam is now always a swipe away. Swipe left to see My Shazam; swipe right for your daily mix of new music from Shazam’s Discover feature. Looking for Charts? You’ll find them in Discover, too.

Auto Shazam has moved home. Just long-press the big Shazam button and we'll keep naming those songs, even when you leave the app.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

. --. --.

This update fixes a loading issue in My Shazam.

--
Version 11.0.0

Pssst…check out Shazam’s fresh new look and feel, and let us know how you like it!

The best of Shazam is now always a swipe away. Swipe left to see My Shazam; swipe right for your daily mix of new music from Shazam’s Discover feature. Looking for Charts? You’ll find them in Discover, too.

Auto Shazam has moved home. Just long-press the big Shazam button and we'll keep naming those songs, even when you leave the app.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

. --. --.

Thanks for Shazaming! We’re always working hard to make the app faster and better than ever. Update to the most recent version to enjoy the latest and greatest Shazam.

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

Swipe right to discover your daily dose of new music! You'll find a mix of new songs, videos, playlists and now concerts - personalised just for you and refreshed every single day.

Ever Shazamed in the car, or while connected to a bluetooth speaker? Music will now continue playing over bluetooth while you’re Shazaming, so no more interruptions!

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account, and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

We know you’re ready for iOS 11 - so is Shazam! Update now for the latest changes.

Shazam for Apple Watch is brand new:
• It’s our fastest version yet - name that song in seconds with a fresh new look and feel.
• Start Shazaming then drop your wrist. We’ll tap you when we’ve found a match.
• Listen to previews of your matches, right from your Apple Watch.
• Note: This update is only supported on watchOS 4.

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com

We’ve been hard at work on performance, making the app lighter, faster and iPhone X ready.

Do you love Apple Music or Spotify? Head to Settings to get your accounts connected and we’ll magically add your Shazams to a playlist. You can even listen to your Shazams in full!

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Do you love Apple Music or Spotify? Head to Settings to get connected and we’ll magically add your Shazams to a playlist. You can even listen to your Shazam matches in full!

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Keep Shazaming, even when you’re offline! Next time the music's on but the WiFi isn't, simply tap the big blue button and we’ll name that song as soon as you're back online.
Now we’ll notify you immediately, even if you don’t have the Shazam app open.

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

Your Shazams have a new look!

Once you’ve named that tune, you’ll see a brand-new song page with the following features:

- Lyric Syncing: Sing it like you wrote it! With our new lyric-syncing, you’ll see a song’s lyrics in real time, enabling you to not just sing along to any song you Shazamed but finally master those words.

- Streamlined Results: Now when you Shazam a song, you’ll get the results and one big photo of the artist behind it—perfect for focusing on the music you were looking to discover in the first place. For more info, simply tap on the artist photo.

- Everything In Its Right Place: We’re excited to introduce an all-new track-result menu that makes it easy to view song lyrics, artist videos, updates and more in a single tap. Or swipe.

- Faster Playlisting: Connected to Apple Music or Spotify? ‘Add to’ playlist now takes one less tap. Simple!

Your Shazams have a new look!

Once you’ve named that tune, you’ll see a brand-new song page.

- Streamlined Results: Now when you Shazam a song, you’ll get the results and one big photo of the artist behind it—perfect for focusing on the music you were looking to discover in the first place. For more info, simply tap on the artist photo.

- Everything In Its Right Place: We’re excited to introduce an all-new track-result menu that makes it easy to view song lyrics, artist videos, updates and more in a single tap. Or swipe.

- Faster Playlisting: Connected to Apple Music or Spotify? ‘Add to’ playlist now takes one less tap. Simple!

Check out our new artist pages, making it easier than ever to listen to their most Shazamed songs, and get all their latest updates.
Charts have had a makeover, too. You can now pick all your favourite hits and add them to a playlist in one go. Swipe to ’Discover’ to get started.

Don’t forget to keep your Shazams safe and in sync between your devices. Simply create an account and we’ll back up your Shazams so you’ll never lose them.

We fixed a bug that was preventing some users from listening to our 30 seconds song previews.

‘My Shazam’ has a new look!

Swipe from Home to your history to see your last Shazam highlighted at the top. Playing or opening it in your favourite streaming provider now takes one fewer tap.

Want to see more of your Shazams? Just scroll down the page and tap on ‘SEE ALL.’ It’s now easier than ever to navigate through your oldest Shazams. Pick your favourite ones and add them to a playlist - because your discoveries are meant to be heard!

We’ve updated our privacy policy to align with the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) at https://www.shazam.com/terms#privacy_policy

Thanks for Shazaming! We’re always working hard to make the app faster and better than ever. Did you know that Shazaming while holding your phone upright (in portrait) will give you the best chance of a match? Give it a try!

Oh and next time you hit Play All on your favourite Chart you’ll see a brand new music player :)

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

Keep the music playing! Next time you hit play on a song, tap on the mini player to check out what’s up next. Also, we’ve made it easier to find new music. From home, swipe to Discover to find Shazam charts, new releases, videos and more.

Thanks for Shazaming! This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

Enjoying the new player? If you’re Apple Music or Spotify connected, we’ve improved background listening. Find your favourite playlist and hit play.

We’ve made it easier to navigate the app. To quickly close the current song page and move to the next, swipe down to dismiss.

Want to see what’s hot in your city? Swipe to Discover and tap on charts to see a load of new country and city charts.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

We know you’re ready for iOS 12 - so is Shazam! 3D Touch on those new match notifications and you can listen to the song without leaving your home screen. Update now for all the latest changes.

iMessage? Yes please! You can now share your recent discoveries straight from the brand new Shazam for iMessage. It’s a quick way to identify music, too. To get started, open the Messages app and add Shazam from the iMessage App Store.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

Discover more about the song you’ve Shazamed by swiping to video and tapping on Highlights! Highlights show you short videos of the artist’s top songs - a great way to find your next favourite hit.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Shazam even better. Got a question? Visit support.shazam.com.

We're now saving more than the songs you Shazamed.

Check out your new Library menu at the top of My Shazam, where you’ll see:

- “Shazams”, for a quick way to navigate and manage your full history - Play All, Add to Apple Music playlists, Buy or Delete.
- “Artists”, for all the artists you ever Shazamed and their top songs.
- "Playlist For You”, for playlists based on the songs you Shazamed.

When did I Shazam that? Good question...
Next time you visit My Shazam, you’ll now see the date and time for each of the songs found.

您现在可以搜索您的 Shazam 历史记录了！前往“音乐库 > Shazam”并向下滑动以显示搜索框，即可通过歌曲或艺术家姓名进行筛选。

通过 Apple Watch 使用 Shazam 识别的用户，请更新至 watchOS 5 以继续享用此应用。

我们知道大家已经做好准备迎接 iOS 13 了，Shazam 也准备好啦！现在，您可以在深色模式下使用 Shazam。

长按整个应用程序中的任何曲目，即可快速将其添加到您最喜爱的流媒体应用中或与朋友分享。想要快速选择要添加到播放列表的曲目列表？只需将两根手指放在曲目列表中的任意位置，然后向下滑动即可进行多选

我们现在保存的不仅仅是您使用 Shazam 识别过的歌曲。
在“我的 Shazam”顶部查看您的新媒体库菜单，您会看到：
- “Shazams”，一种供您导航和管理完整历史记录的快速方式 - 播放全部歌曲、添加到 Apple Music 播放列表、购买或删除。
- “艺术家”，列出您使用 Shazam 识别过的所有艺术家及其热门歌曲。
- “专为您推荐的播放列表”，即根据您使用 Shazam 识别的歌曲而推荐的播放列表。

现在，当您认为 Shazam 没有匹配到正确的歌曲时，可以告诉 Shazam。在您查看歌曲详情时，转到溢出菜单（带有 3 个点的按钮），然后点按以报告错误。感谢您帮助我们改进 Shazam！

做好准备迎接 iOS 14 了吗？Shazam 准备好了！

您现在有更多方式可以命名那首歌曲。将 Shazam 与 Picture in Picture（画中画）功能搭配使用，即可查找视频中的音乐。想要以更快的方式使用 Shazam 识别吗？设置新的 Back Tap（轻点背面）功能以使用 Shazam 快捷方式。

Skip the usernames and passwords! Shazam now supports iCloud, making it easy to keep your Shazams safe and up to date across your devices.

Go to iCloud Sync in Shazam Settings and make sure you have it turned on. That way, if you ever lose your phone you won’t lose your Shazams.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Shazam 换新装！
- 在主页向上滑动即可访问以前的 Shazam 歌曲。
- 当我们发现您有错过或脱机的 Shazam 歌曲时获取通知。
- 查看流行榜热门歌曲。现在在搜索中可用。

使用 Apple Music 或 Spotify？
将 Shazam 歌曲同步到您的“我的 Shazam 曲
目”播放列表变得更轻松了！

对于 Apple Music：
- 现在，我们将同步您更多以前的 Shazam 歌曲。
- 如果您在 Apple Music 中删除歌曲，则不会添加回来。

对于 Spotify：
- 现在，我们将查找并同步您更多的新 Shazam 歌曲。
- 如果您失去连接，我们将尝试在您的下一首 Shazam 歌曲上再次同步。

在 Shazam 设置中尝试一下。
